snippet.title: Code: Realize ~Guardian of Rebirth~ Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Visit http://www.aksysgames.com/code-realize/
for more information.

Aksys Games and Idea Factory proudly present Code: Realize ~Guardian of Rebirth~, an adventure/visual novel game that sweeps you off to times long past. Available today for the PlayStation®Vita handheld entertainment system!

Five classic literary figures (Arsène Lupin, Abraham Van Helsing, Victor Frankenstein, Impey Barbicane, and Count Saint-Germain) are brilliantly reimagined to help you realize your own mysterious past. As the enigmatic Cardia, embark on a journey that features rich characters, eye popping visuals and a deep story that will ignite the fires of your imagination!
